title: I'm trying to change my mouse settings for league, any help?
body: I want to change the mouse button setting, have the right button be the one to move and attack with. I already tried looking it up but the method where you go to the input file and add the two lines isn't working. So If someone who knows how to change the setting please reply.

replies.body: The mouse buttons are reserved, so there's no feature that would allow that.  You can hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if our tech team might be able to help with this. We'll respond to your ticket as soon as possible!
